bioconda.name: ribodetector
bioconda.summary: Accurate and rapid RiboRNA sequences Detector based on deep learning

biotools.summary: RiboDetector is a software developed to accurately yet rapidly detect and remove rRNA sequences from metagenomeic, metatranscriptomic, and ncRNA sequencing data. It was developed based on LSTMs and optimized for both GPU and CPU.

bioschemas.name: RiboDetector
bioschemas.summary: RiboDetector is a software developed to accurately yet rapidly detect and remove rRNA sequences from metagenomeic, metatranscriptomic, and ncRNA sequencing data. It was developed based on LSTMs and optimized for both GPU and CPU.
